oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889; Jackson, Stonewall, 1824-1863; Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Image card featuring 67 leaders of the Confederate Army including Jefferson Davis, Robert E. Lee, Stonewall Jackson, Leonidas Polk, A. S. Johnston, Nathan Bedford Forrest, and many others. Text below reads, "Confederate Chiefs." Each image is numbered and extensive text on the back identifies the pictures with corresponding numbers. The back is labeled "Southern Chiefs."

Text on the front of the card states that "The fund arising from the sale of this picture is reverently dedicated by a Confederate Private to the erection of head stones over the graves of his fallen comrades."
